::Hot Rod/Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm::

Seeing that Radistor was trying to make his escape, but then was cut off
by Gemeni Dragon, the Maximals come up behind Radistor, cournering him.
They once again assualt him with massive weapons fire.
"There is no escape!" Yells Hot Rod.
